text:
Last year, my first wish was "Information & Communication" on ParcoursSup. If I choose that, it's because I don't really have a clearly idea of my future job nor even my "dream" job. My last dream job was footballer but I was seven years old at this moment so I'm not sure that I was conscient of what is studies and jobs. Information & Communication can bring multiples and transversals skills witch can help me in a future job. I'm a dynamic person, I find that stay at the same place and do the same job all days is very annoying. Because of that, I choose a large formation with vast openings. Moreover, I know some persons who did a licence in Information & Communication and they told me a lot of positives aspects. I think that the opinions of these persons conforted me in the idea that Info-Com was a good thing and a strategical point of my future career.
 This webpage performs key logging of input typed into a textbook. in order words focused on the textbook below, the page will record each time you hit a key or select text with your mouse. All of the data is stored locally on your machine in the DOM and is downloadable as a JSON file. More information about the motivation of this project and the format of the produced data are available here.
